text: 14.6% of the overall local population, a significant increase compared to 2011. z In 2021, 6,180 residents identified as Somali or Somalilander, this is 2% of the overall population. SETTING THE SCENEINTRODUCTION z The Black African population has increased; 5% of residents of Tower Hamlets identified as Black African which, at 5% of the local population is double the proportion of England and Wales as a whole (2.5%) but lower than the rate in London (7.9%). z The local Chinese population in Tower Hamlets (3.3%) is the third highest proportion in England and Wales, behind City of London and Cambridge. z Tower Hamlets has the fourth largest Roma population in England and Wales after Brent, Sheffield, and Newham (2,225 people identified as Roma in Tower Hamlets).
